thumb.name: A Little Hello
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETara.%3Cbr%3Ea little hello%3Cbr%3Efrom Both of Us...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...just to let you know%3Cbr%3Ewe're thinking of you.

thumb.name: A Memory Isn't Enough Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMemories can't take your place...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI miss you.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Taking the Time
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EChris...%3Cbr%3EWe always seem to be%3Cbr%3Ein such a hurry these days.%3Cbr%3Eand all too rarely take the time%3Cbr%3Eto tell people%3Cbr%3Ehow much they mean to us...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd you really mean%3Cbr%3Ea lot to me.

thumb.name: Haven't Been in Touch
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm sorry %3Cbr%3EI haven't been too good%3Cbr%3Eabout keeping in touch...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhat's new?%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Dog With Long Ears
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EDana. I got so excited thinking of you. it left a smile on my face%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#133;and a puddle on the carpet!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Always on My Mind Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMolly...%3Cbr%3EThinking of you. Thinking of you.%3Cbr%3EThinking of you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJust can't stop%3Cbr%3Ethinking of you.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You Raised Me Well
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI've become the person I am today. Mom.%3Cbr%3Ebecause of the way you raised me.%3Cbr%3EThe example you set.%3Cbr%3Ethe inspiration you provided.%3Cbr%3Ethe guidance and support%3Cbr%3Eyou so freely gave%3Cbr%3Ehave enabled me%3Cbr%3Eto set goals for myself%3Cbr%3EI might not otherwise%3Cbr%3Ehave imagined...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThank you. Mom.%3Cbr%3Efor being who you are.%3Cbr%3EAnd thanks%3Cbr%3Efor helping me become%3Cbr%3Ethe best person%3Cbr%3Ethat I could be.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Love%3Cbr%3Efrom Jack%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Precious You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEspecially for Morgan%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EPrecious things are%3Cbr%3EAll too few...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGuess that's why%3Cbr%3EThere's just one you!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: God Bless You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGod is Beside You. Natalie. He is always thinking about you and watching everything that concerns you. 1 Peter 5:7%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGod grant you good judgment in all you decide. enough self-assurance to take change in stride. God bless you with courage to help you adjust. make bright new beginnings and do what you must%26#133;God help and inspire you to be the best you and fill you with happiness all your life through.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You're On My Mind
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're on my mind. Chris%26#133;This isn't any special day or memorable occasion. I was just thinking about you and wanted you to know it.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd you know something else? The more I think about you. the more I realize -- that's enough to make any day special!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Perky! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EStephanie.%3Cbr%3EJust thinking of you...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...always perks me up!

thumb.name: Dinosaurs
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThinking of You. Kelly%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHope you have a dino-mite day!%3Cbr%3E
